general. This morning, after two days of deliberation, the
high-level People's Court trial panel
in Hanoi has sentenced 21 people who
appealed in the rescue flight case
according to the law.  The group of defendants who received bribes were
Pham Trung Kien, former secretary of Deputy Minister of
Health Vu Anh Tuan, former deputy head of the
Advisory Department of the Immigration Department of the Ministry of
Public Security and Nguyen Thi Huong Lan, former
director of the Consular Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.  The first
instance verdict was life imprisonment. The defendants accused Mr.
Dung, former Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs, of having his sentence
reduced from 16 to 14 years in prison.
Although the
deputy general director of BL Sky was sentenced to 9 years in prison,
Le Hong Son was sentenced to 8 years. Some defendants had their
sentences reduced to 6 months. Some kept the
first-instance sentence. Tran Minh Tuan, director of
Thai Hoa company, upheld the sentence of 18 years with two sentences.  For the crime of fraudulently
appropriating property and bribing a group of people who took advantage of their
positions and powers while
performing official duties, two defendants, Hoang Linh
and Dang Minh Phuong, had their prison sentences converted
to 30 months in prison and 18
months in prison, respectively.
This morning, the Hanoi Capital Military Court
opened a trial for seven defendants
in the Viet A case. Related to the
Military Medical Academy, the defendants were tried on charges of
abusing their positions and powers while
performing public duties.  violations and violations of bidding regulations
causing serious consequences according to the
Institute of Control's accusations in the face of the
covid-19 epidemic situation with a high risk of
spreading into Vietnam. The Board of Directors of the
Military Medical Academy sent an official dispatch to the Ministry  Science and
Technology Regarding the proposal to develop a
lung diagnostic test for the Corona virus, the
defendants colluded with each other to bring in the test kit
provided by Viet A company, which was not
produced according to the research process
of the University.  Military Medical Institute tested and
used this product to strictly accept the project
after being licensed. Viet A Company
produced a test sign to raise the price and then sold it
to medical facilities to gain
illegal profits according to the law.  It is alleged that the
defendants' fraudulent actions caused damage to the
Military Hospital worth nearly 28 billion
VND
in the world.
Going to the beach in the middle of the
icy season is
dirty and has to move
often but wants a hot,
instant lunch, which seems difficult. But
now this cookie bag from this technology company
in Japan will make your meal even more delicious.  noon
is no longer cold,
according to Witech development director
Ayaka Ueda, the idea of ​​making bags came 6
years ago when her son went to baseball practice
in the winter and every day he had to
practice baseball which was very cold.  Even
when I made hot food for my children to take with them,
it cooled down very quickly and I wondered
if there was a way to solve
this problem. And so this bag was born,
a bag made from conductive fabric that
allows  Heats food from the inside to a
temperature of up to 80° C in just 5 minutes
using the battery. The rice heating time
is about 40 minutes and for children's food, it
only takes 20 to 30 minutes. The bag has a
shape.  Like a laptop bag, very
convenient for daily use.
According to Ms. Eda, the bag only weighs
160g excluding the battery. The time to keep food warm
inside the bag can be up to 8
hours, which is a bad story.

enters the new year 2024. To help people
get rid of all the late memories
of the Old Year, a special festival took
place in the city of KCO Peru, which is the
takan fighting festival that attracts thousands of people.  Hundreds of people
participate. This is a tradition that has existed for many
years in Peru. This annual festival
usually takes place around Christmas with the
purpose of helping participants resolve
conflicts and improve relationships at the beginning of a
new year.  The peaceful event allows
participants to struggle to
resolve conflicts and release
angry emotions. Most of them want to resolve
conflicts related to financial emotions
and legal disputes here.
Judges and referees have a
very important duty to ensure the safety of
participants because some people can get too
excited. By the end of the festival, the
participants dance together in a
peaceful atmosphere.  cheerfully ready to
enter a new year, no longer late.
A new type of tourism in
Sweden is attracting
adventure travel enthusiasts from all over the world:
cold water panels in freezing weather.
and further afield is to swim in the cold sea water
of the
polar region. Tourists participating in the adventure tour will
board the icebreaker Cola Explorer up
to the Arctic Circle, the sea bordering
Sweden and Finland, where the sea has been
frozen since the end.  November to the end of May
this ship has the most special hull,
the Bow can break ice compared to
similar ships, it has more horsepower than the
3-hour Polar Explorer cruise
costs about $313  In La My, people
can admire the view from the
main deck of the ship and if they don't mind they
can jump into the sea in minus
22 degree weather. Normally, most people
swim. We have high-class costumes.  The
rubber is 6 mm thick and is designed so that
people can swim as comfortably as a starfish
with ease. The company expects
about 15,000 to 18,000 people on board the
Pola Explorer this winter.
District 10 police in Ho Chi Minh City
Minh said he was investigating to clarify the
cause of a person falling to his death from the floor at
Ho Chi Minh City University of Economics this
afternoon for students of
Ho Chi Minh City University of Economics, campus
B on Nguyen Tri Street.  District 10
discovered a person falling from the top floor
of the Military Park in front of the main gate

discovered a man
of about 50 years old wearing shorts
and was identified.  was not a person
in the school. Received information that the
police force was present. Blocked the scene and
conducted an initial investigation of the cause. It was
determined that the victim entered the
University of Economics in Ho Chi

down while being

in  Binh Long has an unusual action
of climbing onto a 500 kV high voltage power station
despite the danger to his life. Recently, the

worked with Mr. Nguyen Van, born in
1971, to remind the subject.  Do not
repeat the
previous offense. Around 4:00 p.m. on December 24,
people in the
Trung Nghia Commune Social School hamlet discovered a
man climbing on a high-voltage electric pole, so they
called the local police.
Trung Nghia commune police were there.  was present to persuade the
man to climb down but failed, so he
called the
Provincial Police Department of Fire Prevention and Rescue to ask for
support. The Provincial Police force dispatched
two specialized vehicles and 13 officers.
Soldiers arrived at the scene and arranged forces to
rescue the man. After about 30
minutes, under the persuasion of his
family and the police force, the
man slowly climbed down to safety,
said Mr. Nguyen Van.  Twice a year, he
used alcohol and climbed to a high-voltage power station
but to a lower level and climbed
